reviews.review: This game is really hit or miss. if you arent patient enough to learn it, you will not have fun. but if you take the time to understand the different killers, maps, and perks, youll have a great time. the learning curve is steep, but the game is great (aside from certain undesirable players who make it unfun). if you get angry easily, dont play it. if you like making other people mad in online games, please stay away. :)
This game is only fun when the killer has down syndrom

Очень быстро течет время когда играешь в эту игру.

After spending a couple of hours in this game i feel like I need to post a review to let the people know my feeling about it. Firstly the game is amazing, it's really enjoyable especially when you get in a trial with a pre-made lobby. There are times when we troll and do some memes with flashlights, perks and other items but there are also some hours spend specifically trying to escape the trail. There are killers out there that just camp basement (Letherface I'm looking at you) and there are others that try to have fun but they end up getting rekt. Another thing that hasn't been fixed is the matchmaking system. Sometimes when I'm in like purple or red ranks i end up playing with some baby killers, like completely new killers who just wonna learn the game. They end up not being able to get a hit on people and they later find out that they have been playing with people that have over 1000 hours in the game. Overall, should you buy the game in 2021? Yes, I believe that the game is amazing and there are a lot of new things coming in every now and then. New characters with new perks, new killers so you always have something fresh to play against, as well as new maps so you have to learn another layout if you want to survive. Of course playing with friends or inviting some over to get a game done is always the better choice but still, I enjoy playing the game even if I'm alone. To be honest I ended up dropping the game after like 40 hours but my friends and some youtubers who make content made me get back to it. So as of right now i have around 182 hours and I can guarantee that this game will not go to waste. Except if you don't like the genre that is!
i love the rush this game gives, but i don't love the face camping :)

当你玩透了这个游戏后，什么游戏平衡，屠夫守则人类守则，都已经看透了，就算一个劲儿的反对呼吁又有什么用呢，游戏机制如此，想赢怎么玩都可以，别人才不在乎恶不恶心，刷分守尸顶配烧图，他收获他的快乐，安心沉溺于和屠夫（人类）的对弈才是这个游戏最大的乐趣。

Редкий представитель (если не единственный) хорошего ассиметричного мультиплеера. Довольно высокий порог вхождения, но зато весело. Игра интересная и изучать и играть в нее увлекательно. Есть только один минус - все здесь очень долго загружается. Большое обилие механик и возможность собирать разные билды персонажей, что разнообразит игру. Количество игроков и фанатов игры и ее уже 5летняя поддержка говорят сами за себя.
Es muy buen juego para jugarlo con tus amigos, te echaras un montón de risas recomendadisimo!!
